title: The Haunted Manor
description: Strange noises have been coming from the old manor on the hill. The villagers are scared, and they've asked you to investigate. Will you uncover the mystery?

nodes.title: The Manor Gate
nodes.description: You stand before the rusty iron gates of the old manor. The building looms before you, its windows dark and unwelcoming. A cold wind blows through the overgrown garden.

nodes.title: Entrance Hall
nodes.description: You push open the creaking door and step into a dusty entrance hall. Cobwebs hang from the chandelier, and furniture is covered in white sheets. Suddenly, you hear footsteps upstairs!

nodes.title: Kitchen Entrance
nodes.description: You quietly slip through the back door into an old kitchen. On the table, you find a note and some supplies left by previous visitors. The note warns of 'restless spirits' in the manor.

nodes.title: The Library
nodes.description: You enter a dusty library. Ancient books line the shelves. As you browse, you find a journal describing the manor's history. The last owner was rumored to practice dark magic. Suddenly, books begin flying off the shelves!

nodes.title: Dark Cellar
nodes.description: You descend into a dark, damp cellar. The air is thick with the smell of decay. In the corner, you see movement - skeletal figures rising from the shadows!

nodes.title: Master Bedroom
nodes.description: You climb the stairs to the master bedroom. The room is in disarray, as if someone left in a hurry. In the center of the room stands a ghostly figure - the spirit of the manor's last owner! It raises its spectral hands and attacks!

nodes.title: Peace Restored
nodes.description:
With the spirit defeated, you feel a sense of peace wash over the manor. The oppressive atmosphere lifts, and sunlight begins to stream through the windows. You discover a hidden safe containing the owner's treasure.

The villagers thank you for your bravery, and the manor can now be used again. You've solved the mystery and earned a hero's reward!

*** YOU WIN! ***

nodes.title: Too Scary
nodes.description:
You decide the manor is too dangerous and return to the village. The mysterious noises continue, and the villagers remain frightened.

Perhaps another hero will take up the quest...

*** GAME OVER ***
